Translations.Text: wama ubarri-u nafsi inna l-nafsa la-ammaratun bil-sui illa ma rahima rabbi inna rabbi ghafurun rahimun
waqala l-maliku i'tuni bihi astakhlis'hu linafsi falamma kallamahu qala innaka l-yawma ladayna makinun aminun
qala ij'ʿalni ʿala khazaini l-ardi inni hafizun ʿalimun
wakadhalika makkanna liyusufa fi l-ardi yatabawwa-u min'ha haythu yashau nusibu birahmatina man nashau wala nudiʿu ajra l-muh'sinina
wala-ajru l-akhirati khayrun lilladhina amanu wakanu yattaquna
wajaa ikh'watu yusufa fadakhalu ʿalayhi faʿarafahum wahum lahu munkiruna
walamma jahhazahum bijahazihim qala i'tuni bi-akhin lakum min abikum ala tarawna anni ufi l-kayla wa-ana khayru l-munzilina
fa-in lam tatuni bihi fala kayla lakum ʿindi wala taqrabuni
qalu sanurawidu ʿanhu abahu wa-inna lafaʿiluna
waqala lifit'yanihi ij'ʿalu bidaʿatahum fi rihalihim laʿallahum yaʿrifunaha idha inqalabu ila ahlihim laʿallahum yarjiʿuna
falamma rajaʿu ila abihim qalu yaabana muniʿa minna l-kaylu fa-arsil maʿana akhana naktal wa-inna lahu lahafizuna
qala hal amanukum ʿalayhi illa kama amintukum ʿala akhihi min qablu fal-lahu khayrun hafizan wahuwa arhamu l-rahimina
walamma fatahu mataʿahum wajadu bidaʿatahum ruddat ilayhim qalu yaabana ma nabghi hadhihi bidaʿatuna ruddat ilayna wanamiru ahlana wanahfazu akhana wanazdadu kayla baʿirin dhalika kaylun yasirun
qala lan ur'silahu maʿakum hatta tu'tuni mawthiqan mina l-lahi latatunnani bihi illa an yuhata bikum falamma atawhu mawthiqahum qala l-lahu ʿala ma naqulu wakilun

waqala yabaniyya la tadkhulu min babin wahidin wa-ud'khulu min abwabin mutafarriqatin wama ugh'ni ʿankum mina l-lahi min shayin ini l-huk'mu illa lillahi ʿalayhi tawakkaltu waʿalayhi falyatawakkali l-mutawakiluna

walamma dakhalu min haythu amarahum abuhum ma kana yugh'ni ʿanhum mina l-lahi min shayin illa hajatan fi nafsi yaʿquba qadaha wa-innahu ladhu ʿil'min lima ʿallamnahu walakinna akthara l-nasi la yaʿlamuna
walamma dakhalu ʿala yusufa awa ilayhi akhahu qala inni ana akhuka fala tabta-is bima kanu yaʿmaluna
falamma jahhazahum bijahazihim jaʿala l-siqayata fi rahli akhihi thumma adhana mu-adhinun ayyatuha l-ʿiru innakum lasariquna
qalu wa-aqbalu ʿalayhim madha tafqiduna
qalu nafqidu suwaʿa l-maliki waliman jaa bihi him'lu baʿirin wa-ana bihi zaʿimun
qalu tal-lahi laqad ʿalim'tum ma ji'na linuf'sida fi l-ardi wama kunna sariqina
qalu fama jazauhu in kuntum kadhibina
qalu jazauhu man wujida fi rahlihi fahuwa jazauhu kadhalika najzi l-zalimina

fabada-a bi-awʿiyatihim qabla wiʿai akhihi thumma is'takhrajaha min wiʿai akhihi kadhalika kid'na liyusufa ma kana liyakhudha akhahu fi dini l-maliki illa an yashaa l-lahu narfaʿu darajatin man nashau wafawqa kulli dhi ʿil'min ʿalimun
qalu in yasriq faqad saraqa akhun lahu min qablu fa-asarraha yusufu fi nafsihi walam yub'diha lahum qala antum sharrun makanan wal-lahu aʿlamu bima tasifuna
qalu yaayyuha l-ʿazizu inna lahu aban shaykhan kabiran fakhudh ahadana makanahu inna naraka mina l-muh'sinina
qala maʿadha l-lahi an nakhudha illa man wajadna mataʿana ʿindahu inna idhan lazalimuna

falamma is'tayasu min'hu khalasu najiyyan qala kabiruhum alam taʿlamu anna abakum qad akhadha ʿalaykum mawthiqan mina l-lahi wamin qablu ma farrattum fi yusufa falan abraha l-arda hatta yadhana li abi aw yahkuma l-lahu li wahuwa khayru l-hakimina
ir'jiʿu ila abikum faqulu yaabana inna ib'naka saraqa wama shahid'na illa bima ʿalim'na wama kunna lil'ghaybi hafizina
wasali l-qaryata allati kunna fiha wal-ʿira allati aqbalna fiha wa-inna lasadiquna
qala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amran fasabrun jamilun ʿasa l-lahu an yatiyani bihim jamiʿan innahu huwa l-ʿalimu l-hakimu
watawalla ʿanhum waqala yaasafa ʿala yusufa wa-ib'yaddat ʿaynahu mina l-huz'ni fahuwa kazimun
qalu tal-lahi tafta-u tadhkuru yusufa hatta takuna haradan aw takuna mina l-halikina
qala innama ashku bathi wahuz'ni ila l-lahi wa-aʿlamu mina l-lahi ma la taʿlamuna
yabaniyya idh'habu fatahassasu min yusufa wa-akhihi wala tay'asu min rawhi l-lahi innahu la yay'asu min rawhi l-lahi illa l-qawmu l-kafiruna
falamma dakhalu ʿalayhi qalu yaayyuha l-ʿazizu massana wa-ahlana l-duru waji'na bibidaʿatin muz'jatin fa-awfi lana l-kayla watasaddaq ʿalayna inna l-laha yajzi l-mutasadiqina
qala hal ʿalim'tum ma faʿaltum biyusufa wa-akhihi idh antum jahiluna
qalu a-innaka la-anta yusufu qala ana yusufu wahadha akhi qad manna l-lahu ʿalayna innahu man yattaqi wayasbir fa-inna l-laha la yudiʿu ajra l-muh'sinina
qalu tal-lahi laqad atharaka l-lahu ʿalayna wa-in kunna lakhatiina
qala la tathriba ʿalaykumu l-yawma yaghfiru l-lahu lakum wahuwa arhamu l-rahimina
idh'habu biqamisi hadha fa-alquhu ʿala wajhi abi yati basiran watuni bi-ahlikum ajmaʿina
walamma fasalati l-ʿiru qala abuhum inni la-ajidu riha yusufa lawla an tufanniduni
qalu tal-lahi innaka lafi dalalika l-qadimi
falamma an jaa l-bashiru alqahu ʿala wajhihi fa-ir'tadda basiran qala alam aqul lakum inni aʿlamu mina l-lahi ma la taʿlamuna
qalu yaabana is'taghfir lana dhunubana inna kunna khatiina
qala sawfa astaghfiru lakum rabbi innahu huwa l-ghafuru l-rahimu
falamma dakhalu ʿala yusufa awa ilayhi abawayhi waqala ud'khulu mis'ra in shaa l-lahu aminina

warafaʿa abawayhi ʿala l-ʿarshi wakharru lahu sujjadan waqala yaabati hadha tawilu ru'yaya min qablu qad jaʿalaha rabbi haqqan waqad ahsana bi idh akhrajani mina l-sij'ni wajaa bikum mina l-badwi min baʿdi an nazagha l-shaytanu bayni wabayna ikh'wati inna rabbi latifun lima yashau innahu huwa l-ʿalimu l-hakimu
rabbi qad ataytani mina l-mul'ki waʿallamtani min tawili l-ahadithi fatira l-samawati wal-ardi anta waliyyi fi l-dun'ya wal-akhirati tawaffani mus'liman wa-alhiq'ni bil-salihina
dhalika min anbai l-ghaybi nuhihi ilayka wama kunta ladayhim idh ajmaʿu amrahum wahum yamkuruna
wama aktharu l-nasi walaw harasta bimu'minina
wama tasaluhum ʿalayhi min ajrin in huwa illa dhik'run lil'ʿalamina
waka-ayyin min ayatin fi l-samawati wal-ardi yamurruna ʿalayha wahum ʿanha muʿ'riduna
wama yu'minu aktharuhum bil-lahi illa wahum mush'rikuna
afa-aminu an tatiyahum ghashiyatun min ʿadhabi l-lahi aw tatiyahumu l-saʿatu baghtatan wahum la yashʿuruna
qul hadhihi sabili adʿu ila l-lahi ʿala basiratin ana wamani ittabaʿani wasub'hana l-lahi wama ana mina l-mush'rikina

wama arsalna min qablika illa rijalan nuhi ilayhim min ahli l-qura afalam yasiru fi l-ardi fayanzuru kayfa kana ʿaqibatu alladhina min qablihim waladaru l-akhirati khayrun lilladhina ittaqaw afala taʿqiluna
hatta idha is'tayasa l-rusulu wazannu annahum qad kudhibu jaahum nasruna fanujjiya man nashau wala yuraddu basuna ʿani l-qawmi l-muj'rimina
laqad kana fi qasasihim ʿib'ratun li-uli l-albabi ma kana hadithan yuf'tara walakin tasdiqa alladhi bayna yadayhi watafsila kulli shayin wahudan warahmatan liqawmin yu'minuna
alif-lam-meem-ra til'ka ayatu l-kitabi wa-alladhi unzila ilayka min rabbika l-haqu walakinna akthara l-nasi la yu'minuna

al-lahu alladhi rafaʿa l-samawati bighayri ʿamadin tarawnaha thumma is'tawa ʿala l-ʿarshi wasakhara l-shamsa wal-qamara kullun yajri li-ajalin musamman yudabbiru l-amra yufassilu l-ayati laʿallakum biliqai rabbikum tuqinuna
wahuwa alladhi madda l-arda wajaʿala fiha rawasiya wa-anharan wamin kulli l-thamarati jaʿala fiha zawjayni ith'nayni yugh'shi al-layla l-nahara inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yatafakkaruna

wafi l-ardi qitaʿun mutajawiratun wajannatun min aʿnabin wazarʿun wanakhilun sin'wanun waghayru sin'wanin yus'qa bimain wahidin wanufaddilu baʿdaha ʿala baʿdin fi l-ukuli inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yaʿqiluna
wa-in taʿjab faʿajabun qawluhum a-idha kunna turaban a-inna lafi khalqin jadidin ulaika alladhina kafaru birabbihim wa-ulaika l-aghlalu fi aʿnaqihim wa-ulaika ashabu l-nari hum fiha khaliduna
wayastaʿjilunaka bil-sayi-ati qabla l-hasanati waqad khalat min qablihimu l-mathulatu wa-inna rabbaka ladhu maghfiratin lilnnasi ʿala zul'mihim wa-inna rabbaka lashadidu l-ʿiqabi
wayaqulu alladhina kafaru lawla unzila ʿalayhi ayatun min rabbihi innama anta mundhirun walikulli qawmin hadin
al-lahu yaʿlamu ma tahmilu kullu untha wama taghidu l-arhamu wama tazdadu wakullu shayin ʿindahu bimiq'darin
ʿalimu l-ghaybi wal-shahadati l-kabiru l-mutaʿali
sawaon minkum man asarra l-qawla waman jahara bihi waman huwa mus'takhfin bi-al-layli wasaribun bil-nahari

lahu muʿaqqibatun min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi yahfazunahu min amri l-lahi inna l-laha la yughayyiru ma biqawmin hatta yughayyiru ma bi-anfusihim wa-idha arada l-lahu biqawmin suan fala maradda lahu wama lahum min dunihi min walin
huwa alladhi yurikumu l-barqa khawfan watamaʿan wayunshi-u l-sahaba l-thiqala
wayusabbihu l-raʿdu bihamdihi wal-malaikatu min khifatihi wayur'silu l-sawaʿiqa fayusibu biha man yashau wahum yujadiluna fi l-lahi wahuwa shadidu l-mihali
lahu daʿwatu l-haqi wa-alladhina yadʿuna min dunihi la yastajibuna lahum bishayin illa kabasiti kaffayhi ila l-mai liyablugha fahu wama huwa bibalighihi wama duʿau l-kafirina illa fi dalalin
walillahi yasjudu man fi l-samawati wal-ardi tawʿan wakarhan wazilaluhum bil-ghuduwi wal-asali

qul man rabbu l-samawati wal-ardi quli l-lahu qul afa-ittakhadhtum min dunihi awliyaa la yamlikuna li-anfusihim nafʿan wala darran qul hal yastawi l-aʿma wal-basiru am hal tastawi l-zulumatu wal-nuru am jaʿalu lillahi shurakaa khalaqu kakhalqihi fatashabaha l-khalqu ʿalayhim quli l-lahu khaliqu kulli shayin wahuwa l-wahidu l-qaharu

anzala mina l-samai maan fasalat awdiyatun biqadariha fa-ih'tamala l-saylu zabadan rabiyan wamimma yuqiduna ʿalayhi fi l-nari ib'tighaa hil'yatin aw mataʿin zabadun mith'luhu kadhalika yadribu l-lahu l-haqa wal-batila fa-amma l-zabadu fayadhhabu jufaan wa-amma ma yanfaʿu l-nasa fayamkuthu fi l-ardi kadhalika yadribu l-lahu l-amthala

lilladhina is'tajabu lirabbihimu l-hus'na wa-alladhina lam yastajibu lahu law anna lahum ma fi l-ardi jamiʿan wamith'lahu maʿahu la-if'tadaw bihi ulaika lahum suu l-hisabi wamawahum jahannamu wabi'sa l-mihadu
afaman yaʿlamu annama unzila ilayka min rabbika l-haqu kaman huwa aʿma innama yatadhakkaru ulu l-albabi
alladhina yufuna biʿahdi l-lahi wala yanquduna l-mithaqa
wa-alladhina yasiluna ma amara l-lahu bihi an yusala wayakhshawna rabbahum wayakhafuna sua l-hisabi
wa-alladhina sabaru ib'tighaa wajhi rabbihim wa-aqamu l-salata wa-anfaqu mimma razaqnahum sirran waʿalaniyatan wayadrauna bil-hasanati l-sayi-ata ulaika lahum ʿuq'ba l-dari
jannatu ʿadnin yadkhulunaha waman salaha min abaihim wa-azwajihim wadhurriyyatihim wal-malaikatu yadkhuluna ʿalayhim min kulli babin
salamun ʿalaykum bima sabartum faniʿ'ma ʿuq'ba l-dari
wa-alladhina yanquduna ʿahda l-lahi min baʿdi mithaqihi wayaqtaʿuna ma amara l-lahu bihi an yusala wayuf'siduna fi l-ardi ulaika lahumu l-laʿnatu walahum suu l-dari
al-lahu yabsutu l-riz'qa liman yashau wayaqdiru wafarihu bil-hayati l-dun'ya wama l-hayatu l-dun'ya fi l-akhirati illa mataʿun
wayaqulu alladhina kafaru lawla unzila ʿalayhi ayatun min rabbihi qul inna l-laha yudillu man yashau wayahdi ilayhi man anaba
alladhina amanu watatma-innu qulubuhum bidhik'ri l-lahi ala bidhik'ri l-lahi tatma-innu l-qulubu
alladhina amanu waʿamilu l-salihati tuba lahum wahus'nu maabin

kadhalika arsalnaka fi ummatin qad khalat min qabliha umamun litatluwa ʿalayhimu alladhi awhayna ilayka wahum yakfuruna bil-rahmani qul huwa rabbi la ilaha illa huwa ʿalayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi matabi

walaw anna qur'anan suyyirat bihi l-jibalu aw quttiʿat bihi l-ardu aw kullima bihi l-mawta bal lillahi l-amru jamiʿan afalam yay'asi alladhina amanu an law yashau l-lahu lahada l-nasa jamiʿan wala yazalu alladhina kafaru tusibuhum bima sanaʿu qariʿatun aw tahullu qariban min darihim hatta yatiya waʿdu l-lahi inna l-laha la yukh'lifu l-miʿada
walaqadi us'tuh'zi-a birusulin min qablika fa-amlaytu lilladhina kafaru thumma akhadhtuhum fakayfa kana ʿiqabi

afaman huwa qaimun ʿala kulli nafsin bima kasabat wajaʿalu lillahi shurakaa qul sammuhum am tunabbiunahu bima la yaʿlamu fi l-ardi am bizahirin mina l-qawli bal zuyyina lilladhina kafaru makruhum wasuddu ʿani l-sabili waman yud'lili l-lahu fama lahu min hadin
lahum ʿadhabun fi l-hayati l-dun'ya walaʿadhabu l-akhirati ashaqqu wama lahum mina l-lahi min waqin
mathalu l-janati allati wuʿida l-mutaquna tajri min tahtiha l-anharu ukuluha daimun wazilluha til'ka ʿuq'ba alladhina ittaqaw waʿuq'ba l-kafirina l-naru
wa-alladhina ataynahumu l-kitaba yafrahuna bima unzila ilayka wamina l-ahzabi man yunkiru baʿdahu qul innama umir'tu an aʿbuda l-laha wala ush'rika bihi ilayhi adʿu wa-ilayhi maabi
wakadhalika anzalnahu huk'man ʿarabiyyan wala-ini ittabaʿta ahwaahum baʿdama jaaka mina l-ʿil'mi ma laka mina l-lahi min waliyyin wala waqin
walaqad arsalna rusulan min qablika wajaʿalna lahum azwajan wadhurriyyatan wama kana lirasulin an yatiya biayatin illa bi-idh'ni l-lahi likulli ajalin kitabun
yamhu l-lahu ma yashau wayuth'bitu waʿindahu ummu l-kitabi
wa-in ma nuriyannaka baʿda alladhi naʿiduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-innama ʿalayka l-balaghu waʿalayna l-hisabu
awalam yaraw anna nati l-arda nanqusuha min atrafiha wal-lahu yahkumu la muʿaqqiba lihuk'mihi wahuwa sariʿu l-hisabi
waqad makara alladhina min qablihim falillahi l-makru jamiʿan yaʿlamu ma taksibu kullu nafsin wasayaʿlamu l-kufaru liman ʿuq'ba l-dari
wayaqulu alladhina kafaru lasta mur'salan qul kafa bil-lahi shahidan bayni wabaynakum waman ʿindahu ʿil'mu l-kitabi
alif-lam-ra kitabun anzalnahu ilayka litukh'rija l-nasa mina l-zulumati ila l-nuri bi-idh'ni rabbihim ila sirati l-ʿazizi l-hamidi
al-lahi alladhi lahu ma fi l-samawati wama fi l-ardi wawaylun lil'kafirina min ʿadhabin shadidin
alladhina yastahibbuna l-hayata l-dun'ya ʿala l-akhirati wayasudduna ʿan sabili l-lahi wayabghunaha ʿiwajan ulaika fi dalalin baʿidin
wama arsalna min rasulin illa bilisani qawmihi liyubayyina lahum fayudillu l-lahu man yashau wayahdi man yashau wahuwa l-ʿazizu l-hakimu
walaqad arsalna musa biayatina an akhrij qawmaka mina l-zulumati ila l-nuri wadhakkir'hum bi-ayyami l-lahi inna fi dhalika laayatin likulli sabbarin shakurin

wa-idh qala musa liqawmihi udh'kuru niʿ'mata l-lahi ʿalaykum idh anjakum min ali fir'ʿawna yasumunakum sua l-ʿadhabi wayudhabbihuna abnaakum wayastahyuna nisaakum wafi dhalikum balaon min rabbikum ʿazimun
wa-idh ta-adhana rabbukum la-in shakartum la-azidannakum wala-in kafartum inna ʿadhabi lashadidun
waqala musa in takfuru antum waman fi l-ardi jamiʿan fa-inna l-laha laghaniyyun hamidun

alam yatikum naba-u alladhina min qablikum qawmi nuhin waʿadin wathamuda wa-alladhina min baʿdihim la yaʿlamuhum illa l-lahu jaathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati faraddu aydiyahum fi afwahihim waqalu inna kafarna bima ur'sil'tum bihi wa-inna lafi shakkin mimma tadʿunana ilayhi muribin

qalat rusuluhum afi l-lahi shakkun fatiri l-samawati wal-ardi yadʿukum liyaghfira lakum min dhunubikum wayu-akhirakum ila ajalin musamman qalu in antum illa basharun mith'luna turiduna an tasudduna ʿamma kana yaʿbudu abauna fatuna bisul'tanin mubinin

qalat lahum rusuluhum in nahnu illa basharun mith'lukum walakinna l-laha yamunnu ʿala man yashau min ʿibadihi wama kana lana an natiyakum bisul'tanin illa bi-idh'ni l-lahi waʿala l-lahi falyatawakkali l-mu'minuna
wama lana alla natawakkala ʿala l-lahi waqad hadana subulana walanasbiranna ʿala ma adhaytumuna waʿala l-lahi falyatawakkali l-mutawakiluna
waqala alladhina kafaru lirusulihim lanukh'rijannakum min ardina aw lataʿudunna fi millatina fa-awha ilayhim rabbuhum lanuh'likanna l-zalimina
walanus'kinannakumu l-arda min baʿdihim dhalika liman khafa maqami wakhafa waʿidi
wa-is'taftahu wakhaba kullu jabbarin ʿanidin
min waraihi jahannamu wayus'qa min main sadidin
yatajarraʿuhu wala yakadu yusighuhu wayatihi l-mawtu min kulli makanin wama huwa bimayyitin wamin waraihi ʿadhabun ghalizun
mathalu alladhina kafaru birabbihim aʿmaluhum karamadin ish'taddat bihi l-rihu fi yawmin ʿasifin la yaqdiruna mimma kasabu ʿala shayin dhalika huwa l-dalalu l-baʿidu
alam tara anna l-laha khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi in yasha yudh'hib'kum wayati bikhalqin jadidin
wama dhalika ʿala l-lahi biʿazizin

wabarazu lillahi jamiʿan faqala l-duʿafau lilladhina is'takbaru inna kunna lakum tabaʿan fahal antum mugh'nuna ʿanna min ʿadhabi l-lahi min shayin qalu law hadana l-lahu lahadaynakum sawaon ʿalayna ajaziʿ'na am sabarna ma lana min mahisin

waqala l-shaytanu lamma qudiya l-amru inna l-laha waʿadakum waʿda l-haqi wawaʿadttukum fa-akhlaftukum wama kana liya ʿalaykum min sul'tanin illa an daʿawtukum fa-is'tajabtum li fala talumuni walumu anfusakum ma ana bimus'rikhikum wama antum bimus'rikhiyya inni kafartu bima ashraktumuni min qablu inna l-zalimina lahum ʿadhabun alimun
wa-ud'khila alladhina amanu waʿamilu l-salihati jannatin tajri min tahtiha l-anharu khalidina fiha bi-idh'ni rabbihim tahiyyatuhum fiha salamun
alam tara kayfa daraba l-lahu mathalan kalimatan tayyibatan kashajaratin tayyibatin asluha thabitun wafarʿuha fi l-samai
tu'ti ukulaha kulla hinin bi-idh'ni rabbiha wayadribu l-lahu l-amthala lilnnasi laʿallahum yatadhakkaruna
wamathalu kalimatin khabithatin kashajaratin khabithatin uj'tuthat min fawqi l-ardi ma laha min qararin
yuthabbitu l-lahu alladhina amanu bil-qawli l-thabiti fi l-hayati l-dun'ya wafi l-akhirati wayudillu l-lahu l-zalimina wayafʿalu l-lahu ma yashau
alam tara ila alladhina baddalu niʿ'mata l-lahi kuf'ran wa-ahallu qawmahum dara l-bawari
jahannama yaslawnaha wabi'sa l-qararu
wajaʿalu lillahi andadan liyudillu ʿan sabilihi qul tamattaʿu fa-inna masirakum ila l-nari
qul liʿibadiya alladhina amanu yuqimu l-salata wayunfiqu mimma razaqnahum sirran waʿalaniyatan min qabli an yatiya yawmun la bayʿun fihi wala khilalun

al-lahu alladhi khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda wa-anzala mina l-samai maan fa-akhraja bihi mina l-thamarati riz'qan lakum wasakhara lakumu l-ful'ka litajriya fi l-bahri bi-amrihi wasakhara lakumu l-anhara
wasakhara lakumu l-shamsa wal-qamara daibayni wasakhara lakumu al-layla wal-nahara
waatakum min kulli ma sa-altumuhu wa-in taʿuddu niʿ'mata l-lahi la tuh'suha inna l-insana lazalumun kaffarun
wa-idh qala ib'rahimu rabbi ij'ʿal hadha l-balada aminan wa-uj'nub'ni wabaniyya an naʿbuda l-asnama
rabbi innahunna adlalna kathiran mina l-nasi faman tabiʿani fa-innahu minni waman ʿasani fa-innaka ghafurun rahimun

rabbana inni askantu min dhurriyyati biwadin ghayri dhi zarʿin ʿinda baytika l-muharami rabbana liyuqimu l-salata fa-ij'ʿal afidatan mina l-nasi tahwi ilayhim wa-ur'zuq'hum mina l-thamarati laʿallahum yashkuruna
rabbana innaka taʿlamu ma nukh'fi wama nuʿ'linu wama yakhfa ʿala l-lahi min shayin fi l-ardi wala fi l-samai
al-hamdu lillahi alladhi wahaba li ʿala l-kibari is'maʿila wa-is'haqa inna rabbi lasamiʿu l-duʿai
rabbi ij'ʿalni muqima l-salati wamin dhurriyyati rabbana wataqabbal duʿai
rabbana igh'fir li waliwalidayya walil'mu'minina yawma yaqumu l-hisabu
wala tahsabanna l-laha ghafilan ʿamma yaʿmalu l-zalimuna innama yu-akhiruhum liyawmin tashkhasu fihi l-absaru
muh'tiʿina muq'niʿi ruusihim la yartaddu ilayhim tarfuhum wa-afidatuhum hawaon
wa-andhiri l-nasa yawma yatihimu l-ʿadhabu fayaqulu alladhina zalamu rabbana akhir'na ila ajalin qaribin nujib daʿwataka wanattabiʿi l-rusula awalam takunu aqsamtum min qablu ma lakum min zawalin
wasakantum fi masakini alladhina zalamu anfusahum watabayyana lakum kayfa faʿalna bihim wadarabna lakumu l-amthala
waqad makaru makrahum waʿinda l-lahi makruhum wa-in kana makruhum litazula min'hu l-jibalu
fala tahsabanna l-laha mukh'lifa waʿdihi rusulahu inna l-laha ʿazizun dhu intiqamin
yawma tubaddalu l-ardu ghayra l-ardi wal-samawatu wabarazu lillahi l-wahidi l-qahari
watara l-muj'rimina yawma-idhin muqarranina fi l-asfadi
sarabiluhum min qatiranin wataghsha wujuhahumu l-naru
liyajziya l-lahu kulla nafsin ma kasabat inna l-laha sariʿu l-hisabi
hadha balaghun lilnnasi waliyundharu bihi waliyaʿlamu annama huwa ilahun wahidun waliyadhakkara ulu l-albabi
